title: cultural_data_Albufeira_Municipal_Museum_of_Archaeology
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.realizasom.mmaa.
Application Name: Albufeira Municipal Museum of Archaeology.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: The Albufeira Museum app offers visitors a guided tour of the museum's various rooms and of the collection.The Albufeira Municipal Museum of Archaeology is located in Praça da República, the oldest urban centre of the city. It is part of the Museum Networks of Portugal and the Algarve.The permanent exhibition, from Prehistory to the Modern Age, allows visitors to encounter the culture, heritage and history of the local area, while also enjoying pleasant views over the sea.The app includes a multimedia guide with contents in 5 languages: Portuguese, English, French, Spanish and German.Versions with audio descriptions are also available for visitors with a visual impairment, with sign language for visitors with a hearing impairment, and with audio for children.During your visit you can also test your knowledge with a fun Quiz.Features:- Access to points of interest through lists divided by room/area- Access to points of interest by entering numerical codes- Audio information with professional native voice-overs accompanied by sounds, music and an image gallery- Audio version with audio descriptions for visitors with a visual impairment- Audio version for children- Video version in sign language for visitors with a hearing impairment- Information in text format- Possibility to sequence a visit- List of your favourite points of interest- Content sharing on social media- Quiz at various points of the museum with a results panel- Augmented Reality- Useful information (presentations, contacts…)Read moreCollapse.
